title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 52.2 - Posting of names of candidates for license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 52.2 - Posting of names of candidates for license

State Regulations

The name of any person who is to be examined for license as
pilot shall be posted up in some conspicuous place in the office of the
commissioners at least five days before any examination shall be had, and any
person having any complaint to make against any such person shall make the same
in writing, with his reasons therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง
52.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
